body_html:
This is not final at all, it just makes https://github.com/mozilla/normandy-actions/blob/master/actions/show-heartbeat/index.js function correctly. We still need to decide on a better interface.

Also, I considered adding django-pipeline for bundling the UITour stuff, but I figured that it was overkill at this point in time. Maybe once we add a second external lib we can look at compiling the JS for self-repair together?
